item.title: Diet Hard – Post Mortem
item.description:
Diet Hard – Post Mortem

For the Gamedev JS Jam 2025, I submitted my small and slightly silly game called Diet Hard.
The jam’s theme was “Balance”, and I decided to participate in the Phaser category since I developed the game using PhaserJS.

In the overall jam ranking, I placed 180th out of 420 submissions.
But in the Phaser category, I proudly reached 10th place, and that already made the whole experience worth it!
